properties.name: North Brooklyn Angels - Mobile Soup Kitchen
properties.notes:
- MONDAY’s Community Meal In Greenpoint: 862 Manhattan Avenue
    - The truck is parked in front of the steps of the St Anthony of Padua-St. Alphonsus church at the intersection of Manhattan Avenue and Milton Street.
- TUESDAY’s Community Meal on the Southside: 240 Division Avenue
    - The truck is parked across the street from the Williamsburgh Library on the Division Avenue Overpass, between Marcy Ave & Rodney Street.
- WEDNESDAY’s Community Meal In East Williamsburg/Bushwick: 195 Maujer Street
    - The truck is parked in front of St. John the Evangelist Lutheran Church, across the street from the Williamsburg Houses
- THURSDAY’s Community Meal in Greenpoint: Cooper Park Houses
    - The truck is parked in front of the playground at the intersection of Jackson Street and Debevoise Avenue.
- FRIDAY’s Community Meal in Bushwick & the Northside: 
    - 157 Johnson Ave: The truck is parked on Johnson Ave outside the Most Holy Trinity parking lot.
    - 1 Havemeyer Ave: A meal is served from our community kitchen
- Monday, Wednesday, Friday, deliver food to seniors

properties.notes:
- There is an app required to make an appointment at the food pantry. It's called Plentiful.
- Plentiful is free, and can be downloaded on your phone. You will need to fill out basic info (you do not have to prove income or status,) 
- After basic info is entered, search for the Red Door Place and make a reservation. Make one when it's convenient for you, and come 5 mins before with the appointment confirmation on your phone.
